channel.title: dd-wrt on Everyday Linux
channel.description: Recent content in dd-wrt on Everyday Linux

item.title: DD-WRT Custom Certificate
item.description: DD-WRT Custom Certificate (Tested on R7000) Install acme.sh or other system for creating certs every 30 days from Let’s Encrypt. On your router, plug in an empty USB drive, FAT or ext3/4 formatted. In the router GUI go to Services > USB: Select the following Core USB Support: Enabled USB Storage Support: Enabled Automatic Drive Mount: Enabled Click Apply Settings
